org.ants.jndd.diagram

类 NDD

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ants.jndd.diagram.NDD

  • public class NDD
extends java.lang.Object
    Implement logical operations of NDD.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      NDD()
      Construct function, used for terminal nodes.
      NDD(int field, java.util.HashMap<NDD,java.lang.Integer> edges)
      Construct function, used for non-terminal nodes.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • NDD

        public NDD()
        Construct function, used for terminal nodes.

      • NDD

        public NDD(int field,
           java.util.HashMap<NDD,java.lang.Integer> edges)
        Construct function, used for non-terminal nodes.
        参数:
        field - The field that the node branches on.
        edges - Edges of the node.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initNDD

        public static void initNDD(int nddTableSize,
                           int bddTableSize,
                           int bddCacheSize)
        Init the NDD engine.
        参数:
        nddTableSize - The max size of ndd node table.
        bddTableSize - The max size of bdd node table.
        bddCacheSize - The max size of bdd operation cache.

      • declareField

        public static int declareField(int bitNum)
        Declare a new field.
        参数:
        bitNum - The number of bits in the field.
        返回:
        The id of the field.

      • getVar

        public static NDD getVar(int field,
                         int index)
        Get the ndd variable of a specific bit.
        参数:
        field - The id of the field.
        index - The id of the bit in the field.
        返回:
        The ndd variable.

      • getNotVar

        public static NDD getNotVar(int field,
                            int index)
        Get the negation the variable for a specific bit.
        参数:
        field - The id of the field.
        index - The id of the bit in the field.
        返回:
        The negation of the ndd variable.

      • clearCaches

        public static void clearCaches()
        Clear all the caches, the api is usually invoked during garbage collection.

      • ref

        public static NDD ref(NDD ndd)
        Protect a root node from garbage collection.
        参数:
        ndd - The root to be protected.
        返回:
        The ndd node.

      • deref

        public static void deref(NDD ndd)
        Unprotect a root node, such that the node can be cleared during garbage collection.
        参数:
        ndd - The ndd node to be unprotected.

      • getTemporarilyProtect

        public static java.util.HashSet<NDD> getTemporarilyProtect()
        Get all the temporary nodes.
        返回:
        All the temporary nodes.

      • andTo

        public static NDD andTo(NDD a,
                        NDD b)
        The logical operation AND, which automatically ref the result and deref the first operand.
        参数:
        a - The first operand.
        b - The second operand.
        返回:
        The result of the logical operation.

      • orTo

        public static NDD orTo(NDD a,
                       NDD b)
        The logical operation OR, which automatically ref the result and deref the first operand.
        参数:
        a - The first operand.
        b - The second operand.
        返回:
        The result of the logical operation.

      • diff

        public static NDD diff(NDD a,
                       NDD b)
        The logical operation DIFF, which is equivalent to a AND (NOT b).
        参数:
        a - The operand.
        返回:
        The result of the logical operation.

      • exist

        public static NDD exist(NDD a,
                        int field)
        The existential quantification.
        参数:
        a - The operand.
        field - The field to run an existential quantification.
        返回:
        The result.

      • imp

        public static NDD imp(NDD a,
                      NDD b)
        The logical implication, which is equivalent to (NOT a) OR b.
        参数:
        a - The first operand.
        b - The second operand.
        返回:
        The result of the logical implication.

        public static double satCount(NDD ndd)
        The number of solutions encoded in the ndd node.
        参数:
        ndd - The ndd node.
        返回:
        The number of solutions.

        Create or reuse an NDD node.
